title: Bug 27869: StyledText Font.getFontData Overuse
description: The issue arises from excessive use of Font.getFontData in StyledText. Additionally, on Redhat 8, UTF-8 serves as the default English encoding. The FontMetrics API heavily interfaces with StyledText. I propose caching metric information within StyledText and updating it only upon font changes.
OB: The StyledText component currently excessively utilizes Font.getFontData, impacting performance and efficiency.
EB: The usage of Font.getFontData within StyledText, especially during typing, should be minimized or eliminated entirely. There's widespread agreement among users regarding this unnecessary usage.
SR: 1. Open StyledText component. 2. Perform typing actions. 3. Observe the extensive usage of Font.getFontData.
